inclusion.criterion: less than 24 hours after the onset of MI symptoms
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ST-segment elevation of a least 1 mm (frontal plane) or 2 mm (horizontal plane) in two contiguous leads
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: myocardial necrosis, as evidenced by increase to at least one value above the 99th percentile above the reference limit of CK-MB (25 U/L) and troponin I (0·04 ng/mL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: followed by a decline of both
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant diseases with short-term survival expectancy, i.e. cancer, severe COPD
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a family history of CAD and severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery.
